title: The Last whalers
creator_credit: International Film Foundation, William Neufeld and Julien Bryan
brief_description: A study of simple European life that focuses on a group of whalers and on the customs and traditions of the Pico Island villages. Filmed on Pico Island, The Azores (Portugal).
creator_credit_for_label: International Film Foundation, William Neufeld and Julien Bryan
